sense.gloss: to shift, to move, to slide
to move (an appointment, meeting, etc.), to bring forward, to put back, to put off, to delay, to postpone, to stagger (e.g. working hours)

sdata.j: あなたの↑弟↑↓おとうと↓にいた|ずらす|るのをやめなさい。
sdata.e: Stop playing tricks on your brother.

sdata.j: ↑子供↑↓こども↓は↑皆↑↓みな↓ときにいた|ずらす|るものだ。
sdata.e: All children can be naughty sometimes.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はいた|ずら↑好↑↓す|↓きだ。
